description: Easy walking/biking trail in Port Moody, BC.------------Starting in Rocky Point Park either at the pier or Pajo's Fish & Chips, follow the paved path (part of the Trans Canada Trail) east until it begins to head north and then north-west around the Inlet in Port Moody. Ends at Old Orchard Park where there is a public restroom and small park to enjoy a snack. Head back the same way and finish at Pajo's for lunch/dinner and grab an ice cream at Rocky Point Ice Cream.-------------Can be walked in about 1:15, or ridden in about 30mins on a bike, round trip.
directions: From St. Johns Street in Port Moody, head north on Moody Street and continue towards The Boathouse Restaurant. Park here or on Murray Street.
title: Rocky Point Inlet Trail
